Name: GALE Phase 2 Arabic Broadcast News Parallel Text
Description: GALE Phase 2 Arabic Broadcast News Parallel Text includes seven source-translation pairs, comprising 29,210 words of Arabic source text and its English translation. Data is drawn from six distinct Arabic programs broadcast between 2005 and 2007 from Abu Dhabi TV, based in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates Al Alam News Channel, based in Iran Aljazeera, a regional broadcast programmer based in Doha, Qatar Dubai TV, based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and Kuwait TV, a national television station based in Kuwait. The BN programming in this release focuses on current events topics.
